tasks.title: Set up Authentication with Clerk
tasks.description: Implement user authentication system using Clerk with email/password, social OAuth, and magic link authentication options. Integrate with existing React frontend components.
tasks.details:
1. Create a Clerk application in the Clerk dashboard
2. Install Clerk SDK: `npm install @clerk/clerk-react`
3. Configure Clerk provider in the main application component
4. Create protected routes using Clerk's `<SignedIn>` and `<SignedOut>` components
5. Integrate Clerk authentication with existing Auth UI component
6. Connect authentication with Dashboard and Onboarding components
7. Set up webhook endpoint for Clerk events
8. Configure user session management with JWT tokens
9. Sync user data between Clerk and Supabase
10. Implement Row Level Security policies for user data in Supabase
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Unit tests for Clerk provider integration
2. Integration tests for protected routes
3. End-to-end tests for authentication flows with existing Auth UI
4. Test authentication state persistence across Dashboard and Onboarding components
5. Manual testing of social OAuth providers
6. Verify webhook functionality with test events
7. Test session persistence and token refresh
8. Validate user data synchronization between Clerk and Supabase
9. Validate security policies with different user accounts

tasks.title: Create Database Schema and Supabase Setup
tasks.description: Set up Supabase project and implement the complete database schema with proper relationships and Row Level Security policies.
tasks.details:
1. Create new Supabase project
2. Define all database tables according to the PRD data models:
   - users
   - companies
   - user_saved_companies
   - company_research
   - project_ideas
   - projects
   - outreach_emails
   - voltagent_executions
   - clerk_webhook_events
3. Set up foreign key relationships between tables
4. Create indexes for frequently queried columns
5. Implement Row Level Security policies for all tables
6. Configure Supabase Storage buckets for resume uploads and project assets
7. Set up database triggers for automated workflows
8. Create Supabase Edge Functions for API endpoints
9. Configure Supabase Realtime for subscription features
10. Document schema with ERD diagram
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify table creation and relationships with test queries
2. Test RLS policies with different user contexts
3. Validate foreign key constraints with sample data
4. Benchmark query performance with indexes
5. Test storage bucket access controls
6. Verify database triggers with test events
7. Load test with sample data to ensure scalability

tasks.title: Integrate Voltagent AI Framework
tasks.description: Set up the Voltagent AI framework to orchestrate all three AI agents that power the research, project idea generation, and email outreach features with real intelligence.
tasks.details:
1. Set up Voltagent framework and agent configurations
2. Create Supabase Edge Functions for agent triggers:
   - /voltagent/research
   - /voltagent/project-generator
   - /voltagent/email-outreach
3. Implement streaming responses for real-time agent feedback
4. Add proper error handling, retry logic, and rate limiting
5. Create engaging loading states with agent progress indicators
6. Store agent execution logs in voltagent_executions table
7. Implement caching for agent responses to improve performance
8. Add regeneration triggers for unsatisfactory results
9. Create agent context management for personalized outputs
10. Implement token usage tracking and optimization
11. Configure Voltagent to orchestrate all three AI agents (research, project idea generation, and email outreach)
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test each agent endpoint with sample inputs
2. Verify streaming response functionality
3. Test error handling and retry mechanisms
4. Validate rate limiting functionality
5. Test caching with repeated requests
6. Verify agent execution logging
7. Performance testing for response times
8. Test regeneration functionality
9. Validate agent orchestration across all three features
